product_name: A Walking Guide to the Superior Hiking Trail
long_description: This walking guide details the natural history, scenic vistas, trail conditions and historical places seen along the Superior Hiking trail. Authors: Roy Morton and Judy Gibbs. Softcover; 332 pages; maps; graphs. RockFlower Press; copyright 2006. Thirty-two walks are highlighted with numerous, easily recognizable waypoints marking geological, botanical, historical or geographic features. Each walk includes topographic details; walkers with GPS units can upload waypoints for all 32 walks from RockFlowerPress.com. Includes detailed elevation and trail maps with individual waypoints and pertinent topographic and geologic features.
short_description: This walking guide details the natural history, scenic vistas, trail conditions and historical places seen along the Superior Hiking trail.
